Create a virtual reality experience: You can create a virtual reality experience that allows you to play guitar in a virtual world. This will provide a new and exciting environment for you to practice and play guitar.
Learn a new song: Every day, you can choose a new song to learn and practice. This will keep you engaged and motivated

Collaborate with other musicians: You can find other musicians online and collaborate with them to create music. This will give you a new perspective on guitar playing and help you develop new skills.
Create a guitar challenge: You can create a daily guitar challenge and share it with others. This will help you!\
Create a music video game: You can create a music video game where you can play and record songs, this will help!\
